trans-unit.source: A block-level flow content element that provides facilities for presenting content in an ordered or unordered list.
trans-unit.target: 區塊層級非固定格式內容的項目提供在排序或未排序清單呈現內容的機能。

trans-unit.source: List enforces a strong content model for child content.
trans-unit.target: 清單會強制執行強式的內容模型的子內容。

trans-unit.source: See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information about the List content model.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[TextElement 內容模型概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)如需有關清單的內容模型。

trans-unit.source: List is a flow content element designed to be formatted with markers such as bullets or numbering.
trans-unit.target: 清單是設計來格式化具有標記，例如項目符號或編號流動內容項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem> elements are the only permissible children for a List element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem>項目是只允許清單項目的子系。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的空白執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"></xref> object as the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"></xref>類別，取得指定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"></xref>物件做為新的初始內容<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"></xref> object specifying the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"> </xref>物件，指定新的初始內容<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection"></xref> containing the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"></xref> elements that comprise the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection"></xref>包含<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"></xref>這些項目組成的內容<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection> returned by this property to enumerate or manipulate the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> element.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection>列舉或操作的內容，這個屬性所傳回<xref:System.Windows.Documents.List>項目。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection"></xref> containing the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"></xref> elements that comprise the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection"> </xref>包含<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"></xref>這些項目組成的內容<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the desired distance between the contents of each <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"></xref> element, and the near edge of the list marker.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定每個內容間的所需的距離<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"></xref>項目，以及清單標記近端邊緣。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value equal to or greater than **0.0** but smaller than .
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` - or - - or - ``` # # XAML 值*double*的字串表示法值等於或大於**0.0**但小於.

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 不合格的值是以與裝置無關的像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *double*值 （如上所述），(excepting `Auto`) 後面接著一個下列單元規範︰ `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px Auto Causes the marker offset to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.
trans-unit.target: `px`（預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in`英吋; 1in = = 96px`cm`是公分; 1cm==(96/2.54) px`pt`點; 1pt==(96/72) px 自動會由目前字型特性自動決定標記位移。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to a property value of <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: 相當於<xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN>的屬性值

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|、 |

trans-unit.source: A double value specifying the desired distance between list content and the near edge of list markers, in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 雙精度浮點數值，指定與裝置無關的像素中清單內容與清單標記近端邊緣之間的所需的距離。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Double> (equivalent to an attribute value of "`Auto`") causes the marker offset to be determined automatically.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref:System.Double>(相當於屬性值的"`Auto`」) 會造成標記位移自動決定。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List.MarkerOffset*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Documents.List.MarkerOffset*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.List.MarkerOffset*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the marker style for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的標記樣式<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|MarkerStyle| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 |MarkerStyle | |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|、 |

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.TextMarkerStyle"></xref> enumeration specifying the marker style to use.
trans-unit.target: 成員<xref href="System.Windows.TextMarkerStyle"></xref>列舉型別指定要使用的標記樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.TextMarkerStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.TextMarkerStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List.MarkerStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Documents.List.MarkerStyle*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.List.MarkerStyle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting index for labeling the items in an ordered list.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定標記的項目已排序的清單中的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect on unordered lists.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性具有不會影響未排序清單。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|、 |

trans-unit.source: The starting index for labeling items in an ordered list.
trans-unit.target: 用於標示為已排序的清單中的項目起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **1**.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是**1**。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List.StartIndex*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Documents.List.StartIndex*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.List.StartIndex*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
